function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Under-coverage of vaccination by ethnic origin due to coding errors","Impact":"Potential higher spread of contagious diseases within specific ethnic groups","Mitigation":"Implement data verification processes to ensure accurate coding of vaccination by ethnic origin","Technologies":"Data verification and validation software","People":"Non-Latino White and Latino communities","Owner":"Health organizations and government agencies"},{"Description":"Immigrants receiving vaccinations in their origin countries not being registered in the destination","Impact":"Inaccurate vaccination coverage data and potential underestimation of immunity in the destination country","Mitigation":"Establish cross-border data sharing agreements for vaccination records","Technologies":"Interoperable vaccination record systems","People":"Immigrants and government health agencies","Owner":"Government health agencies and international health organizations"},{"Description":"Complexity in adding vaccinations administered abroad to registers","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of vaccination coverage in destination country","Mitigation":"Establish streamlined processes for adding foreign-administered vaccinations to local registers","Technologies":"Digital vaccination passport systems","People":"Immigrants and health authorities","Owner":"Health authorities and government agencies"}]}
